posts.title: Register Now: National Novel Writing Month Workshops with New York Writers Workshop
posts.text: The New York Public Library is delighted to join forces with New York Writers Workshop (NYWW) to present a series of writing workshops for this year's National Novel Writing Month. Register now for workshops with writers Christina Chiu, Laura Geringer Bass, Tim Tomlinson, Charles Salzberg, and Laura Zinn Fromm.
